content.question: A particle moves on the circle <math alttext="x squared, plus y squared, equals 25 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> in the <math alttext="x y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-plane for time <math alttext="t is greater than or equal to 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. At the time when the particle is at the point <math alttext="with coordinates 3 comma 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="the derivative of x, with respect to t, equals 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. What is the value of <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to t " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> at this time?

choices.label: <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to t, equals, the fraction 19 over 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>19</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to t, equals, negative three fourths" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to t, equals, the negative of the fraction 11 over 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>11</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to t, equals, negative nine halves" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to t, equals, negative nine halves" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the meaning of mathematical solutions in context.
